chapter.title: Vouchering Sheets
chapter.para: Now that you've set up Items and Employees, you are ready to begin processing Time and Expense Sheets. In this chapter we will review how to voucher Open Time and Expense Sheets. The following topics will be covered:

section.title: Approving Sheets
section.para: Before you can Voucher a Time Sheet they must be approved. Approving Sheets is performed in the Open Sheets screen. For this scenario, we'll need to select a single Sheet to begin. To select a Sheet, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Follow this path: CRM > Project > Time and Expense...
Right click on the open Sheet

tip.para: Some of the button options available in the toolbar may be disabled if you do not have the appropriate privileges. For more information, please see .

section.para: Let's approve the open Sheet. To get started, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Right click select the APPROVE button. The Sheet is now approved and ready for Invoicing and Vouchering.

section.title: Vouchering Sheets
section.para: The vouchering of specific Sheets is performed in the Open Sheets screen. For this scenario, we'll need to select a single Sheet to begin.

note.para: In order to generate a Voucher for an Employee, the Employee must also be a Vendor.

section.para: To select a Sheet, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Follow this path: CRM > Time and Expense > Open Sheets...

tip.para: Some of the button options available in the toolbar may be disabled if you do not have the appropriate privileges. For more information, please see .

listitem.para: Select a Sheet that has been approved
Check the "Voucher" check box at the bottom of the screen
Click the PROCESS button or use the right-click "Process" option to generate a Voucher

note.para: The Voucher Status changes to "Yes" for Completed.

listitem.para: To review the unposted Voucher, follow this path: Accounting > Accounts Payable > Voucher > List Unposted...
